rules_text: Caress the Fleets deals 1 damage to each creature. Create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Make no mistake, this was a show of power. If it wanted us dead, we wouldn't be alive to have this conversation.”[/i]
